price: Ìmọ̀ràn mi kò sì lè ṣe yín ní àǹfààní tí mo bá fẹ́ gbà yín nìmọ̀ràn, tí Allāhu bá fẹ́ pa yín run. Òun ni Olúwa yín. Ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ sì ni wọn yóò da yín padà sí.”
arabic: وَلَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ نُصۡحِيٓ إِنۡ أَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَنصَحَ لَكُمۡ إِن كَانَ ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يُغۡوِيَكُمۡۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā yanfaʿukum nuṣ'ḥī in aradttu an anṣaḥa lakum in kāna al-lahu yurīdu an yugh'wiyakum huwa rabbukum wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
